pools.description: Alex Duff Outdoor Pool is located at the edge of Christie Pitts Park, in close proximity to the outdoor ice rink. The pool features a 25m lap pool, shallow splash pool for children, warm conversation pool, a deep pool for diving with a 1m spring board, and a two storey water slide. The 25m pool has an access ramp for those who require easy access. The facility is used in the off-season for afterschool programs and local user groups. Please contact Bob Abate CC for off season programing.
pools.transit: Travel to Christie Station. Exit station and walk west to 779 Crawford St

pools.description: Amos Waites Outdoor Pool is located in a park-setting, near a playground structure along the recently revitalized waterfront. We offer swim lessons, for all ages and abilities, weekday mornings. Leisure swim, adult swim, and family swim are offered afternoons, evenings and weekends. An afternoon at the pool and waterfront park could be the perfect family outing!
pools.transit: Travel to Royal York Station. Board 76 Royal York South and travel to Mimico. Walk to 2445 Lake Shore Blvd. Take 501 Queen streetcar westbound to Mimico. Walk to 2445 Lake Shore Blvd.

pools.description: A 2.7 hectare park at Bathurst Street and Dundas Street West featuring a ball diamond, picnic area, community garden, volleyball court, skateboard area, wading pool and children's playground. On the west side of the park is the Alexandra Park/Harry Gairey Outdoor Atrificial Ice Rink. On the north side of the park is the Alexandra Park Outdoor Pool and the Scadding Court Community Centre.

A 2.5 hectare park near Victoria Park Ave and Kingston Rd. This park features a lighted ball diamond, a picnic area, a horseshoe pit and a children's playground. Loacted at the north end of the park is the Blantyre Park Outdoor Pool. Blantyre Outdoor Pool is located within Blantyre Park. Our schedule features swimming lessons as well leisure swim and lane swim.
pools.transit: Travel to Warden Station, board 135 Gerrard towards Main Street Station. Arrive at Gerrard Street East at Clonmore Drive farside. Walk to your destination

pools.description: A small community centre located in the DVP and Lawrence area in a residential community. Programs are offered for preschoolers, children, adults and older adults. Rooms can also be permitted by groups or individuals.
pools.transit: Travel to Eglinton Station. Board the 54A Lawrence East. Travel to Railside W Farside. Walk north on Underhill Dr, then East on Broadlans and then North East on Castlegrove to 19.

pools.description: Amesbury Sports Complex is located at the corner of Lawrence Ave. West and Culford Road, two blocks east of Black Creek Drive. Programs are offered based on the ammenities for example skating, bocce, leisure swim and skating. Community sports organizations operate their ice and ball hockey leagues out of this centre.
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence West Station. Board the 52 Lawrence West and travel to Culford. Arrive at 155 Culford Rd.

pools.description: Donald D. Summerville Outdoor Olympic Pool complex is located on the beach, at Woodbine Park. This facility features a 50 metre Olympic size pool, 25 metre training pool and a separate diving pool. The diving pool features 5 and 10 metre diving platforms. This facility is undergoing a $3.75 million capital renovation project and will be completed in 2015 to make your swimming experience more enjoyable.In 2013, changes were made to the deck surfacing to help maintain the structural integrity of the facility, and provide a safer, slip resistant deck for patrons.Future phases of work starting next year will include: new pool mechanical equipment, new pool liners and coping, interior renovations to the change rooms and washrooms, accessibility upgrades, and new deck shade structures.
pools.transit: Travel to Queen station. Board the 501 Queen Streetcar to Woodbine Ave. Walk South to Lake Shore Ave. From Woodbine Station, take the bus 92 Woodbine South.

pools.description: Welcome to Eringate pool! This Outdoor Pool is located in a quiet neighbourhood, in a park setting. We offer a wide variety of aquatic programming including learn to swim, leisure, family and length swimming opportunities to persons of all ages and abilities. Eringate Pool is also home to a very popular children's recreational swim team and water polo program. We strive to meet the needs of the community and make every visit enjoyable for the whole family.
pools.transit: Travel to Kipling Station.  Board the 112C West Mall and travel to Eringate. Walk north to 121 Wellesworth Drive.

pools.description: This 3.5 hectare park on Dufferin St. just south of Eglinton Ave features a lighted ball diamond, 5 bocce courts, a basket ball court, a children's playground and two outdoor pools. Loacted on the site is the Fairbank Memorial Community Recreation Centre.

This community pool is located in Flagstaff Park just west of Martin Grove Rd. near West Humber Blvd. in the north-west end of Toronto. Leisure Open, Leisure Family and Lane swims are offered in the afternoons, evenings and weekends. Flagstaff Pool is situated in a park, next to tennis courts and a playground area.
pools.transit: Travel to Kipling Station. Board the 46 Martin Grove Bus and travel to Westhumber Blvd/Mercury Road. Walk west on Mercury Road to the pool (approximately 850 metres).

pools.description: Fairhaven Outdoor Pool is located within picturesque Fairhaven Park. A wading pool is located within walking distance of the pool. Our schedule features family swim, a quieter swim time designated for parents and children, as well as adult swim, a time for adults to enjoy swimming in a more peaceful environment.
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence West Station. Board the 58B Malton and travel to Golfwood. Walk North to 100 Golfwood Heights

pools.description: Gihon Spring Pool is located in a park, near a brand new playground structure. Swimming lessons for all ages are offered weekday mornings. Recreational swims are offered weekday afternoons, evenings and weekends.
pools.transit: Travel to Kipling Station. Board the 46 Martin Grove and travel to Gihon Spring. Walk east to 75 Gihon Spring Drive.

pools.description: Welcome to Giovanni Caboto - we offer afternoon and evening public swimming and adult swimming during the summer season in one of Toronto's most vibrant communities. We are located in a massive recreation group that includes J.J.P community centre, soccer fields, a ball hockey arena and wading pool to name a few. Parking is limited in the area but it is a wonderful facility to enjoy the walk to and from and then enjoy the adventures on St. Clair Avenue.
pools.transit: Travel to St Clair West Station. Board the 512 St Clair and travel to Lansdowne. Walk to 1368 St Clair Avenue West.

pools.description: A facility located in the Jane and Sheppard area, Domenico Di Luca offers a variety of recreational programming for everyone from preschool to older adults to enjoy. Come in and get involved in a variety of sports, arts, fitness, preschool and youth leadership programs.
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence West Station. Board the 58A Malton and travel to Jane. Debark and on the northbound side of Jane at Lawrence board the 35D Jane and travel to Rita Farside Walk west to 25 Stanley Rd

pools.description: Welcome to Glen Long Community Centre. This centre is located in the Dufferin & Lawrence area nestled within the heart of the community. We offer a wide range of programs from preschool to older adults. We are known for the abundance of summer camps both in the centre and the surrounding community. If you are looking for a strong community based centre with high quality programs, come and check us out!
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence West Station. Board the 52 Lawrence West and travel to Dufferin. Walk South on Dufferin, then west on Glen Park Ave, and then nmorth on Glen Long Ave to number 35.

pools.description: This 6.2 hectare park on lies on Greenwood Avenue north of Dundas Street East. It features two lit ball diamonds, a multi-purpose sports field, a dog off-leash area, a community garden, a splash pad and a children's playground. The Greenwood Park outdoor pool is located at the north end of the park. An outdoor artificial ice rink is available in winter, and used for ball hockey in the summer months. Greenwood Park Outdoor Pool features a 35m shallow pool which is approximately 2m at the deep end. There is a large pool deck with a raised seating area on the north side.
pools.transit: Travel to Greenwood Station. Board the 31 Bus south to Gerrard Street East.  Walk west on Gerrard to Alton Ave.  Turn left onto Alton Ave and walk south to Greenwood Park.

pools.description: Goulding Community Centre is located just south of Steeles Ave on the west side of Yonge St. The building has an indoor arena, outdoor pool and several rooms including a viewing gallery, multipurpose and dance room for various uses. The building is surrounded by beautiful green fields including two baseball diamonds.
pools.transit: Travel to Finch Station. Board the 60D Steeles West and travel to Centre Ave. Walk to 45 Goulding Ave

pools.description: Grandravine Community Centre is located at Keele Street and Grandravine Drive. It is a large multifunctional centre and is the home of many community groups. The new program Hockey In the Neighbourhood is a successful low cost introduction to the sport of Hockey.
pools.transit: Travel to Downsview Station. Board the 84 Sheppard West and travel to Keele. Walk North on Keele and then West on Grandravine Dr to number 23.

pools.description: A 2.1 hectare park near Kingston Road and McCowan Road that features a ball diamond, a multipurpose sports field, a spalsh pad, a children's playground and the Halbert Park Outdoor Pool.H.A. Halbert Outdoor Pool is located within Halbert Park. A wading pool is located within walking distance of the pool. Our schedule features swimming lessons as well leisure swim and lane swim.
pools.transit: Travel to Scarborough Centre Station, board the 9 Bellamy towards Warden Station. Arrive at McCowan Road at Cree Avenue. walk south on McCowan Road, turn left at Cree Ave, turn right at Lowell Ave, Turn left at Phyllis Ave, turn right at Rockwood Drive.

pools.description: Kiwanis outdoor pool is located in the Stan Wadlow Park in close proximity to the Stan Wadlow Club House, East York Arena, and East York Curling Club. Kiwanis pool features a large pool deck, male and female changerooms and a deep pool for jumping and diving. It also has a water slide open for people of all ages who complete the facility swim test.
pools.transit: Travel to Main Street Station. Board the 62 Mortimer and travel to the farside of Cedarvale. Walk north to 373 Cedarvale Ave.

pools.description: A 13.5-hectare park on Brimley Road near Danforth Road that features a lighted ball hockey court, two lighted basketball courts, outdoor swimming pool, a wading pool and children's playground. The park also features a naturalized ravine with walking trails along the West Highland Creek.Knob Hill Outdoor Pool is located within picturesque Knob Hill Park. A wading pool is located within walking distance of the pool. Our schedule features instructional swimming lessons as well leisure swim and lane swim.
pools.intersection: N of Eglinton & E of Brimley
pools.transit: Travel to Kennedy Road Station. Board the 21 Brimley bus towards Steels Ave. East and travel to Gully Drive. Enter the park and follow the path to the centre of the park.

pools.pool: Gord And Irene Risk Community Centre
pools.description: Gord & Irene Risk is located at the north east corner of Islington Rd. and Finch Ave, serving a diverse community with preschool, fitness, swimming and general interest programs for all ages. Purchase a Bocce membership and come play according to your lifestyle - open afternoons and evenings! To reach the needs of the greater community, afterschool and pre-school programs are also offered at a satellite location - Venerable John Merlini CSS. So come in and enjoy your summer days at camp, swimming with new friends and when winter arrives, lace up the skates for free public skating!
pools.transit: Travel to Islington Station. Board the 37 Islington and travel to Finch. Walk east to 2650 Finch Avenue West

pools.description: Irving W. Chapley offers programs for various age groups.  Space is used by various community groups as well as some city implemented fitness, chess & keyboard programs. This facility is surrounded by a wonderful outdoor green space that is enhanced by tennis courts, basketball courts, ball hockey courts, bocce courts, softball diamond, playground and plenty of open grass space.
pools.transit: Travel to Wilson Station. Board the 104 Faywood and travel to Overbrook. Walk North to 205 Wilmington Ave.

pools.description: The park, over one-third of which remains in a natural state, is home to many species of wildlife, including birds, fish and animals. Recognized as one of the most significant natural sites within the City of Toronto, the park contains an outstanding concentration of rare plant species. The park offers many popular attractions as well as activities for visitors to enjoy. More info
pools.transit: Travel to High Park Station. Exit the East Side of High Park Station and continue east to High Park Ave. Walk south to Bloor St. West and cross over the intersection at the lights into the park.

pools.description: This 1.6 hectare park near Bathurst St. and Lawrence Ave. West features an artificial ice rink, an outdoor pool and a splash pad.
Maryvale Pool is a community outdoor pool located in the east end of Maryvale Park. This location offers swimming lessons, leisure and lane swim.This is a 25 yard pool.

Welcome to Lambton-Kingsway pool! This Outdoor Pool is located in a quiet residential neighbourhood, in a park setting. We offer a very large and popular learn to swim program, catering to all ages and abilities, weekday mornings. Afternoon, evening and weekend aquatic programming includes leisure, family and length swimming opportunities. Lambton-Kingsway Pool is also home to a very popular children's recreational swim team - Splash. Situated next to tennis courts and a playground area, the park and pool are the perfect place for a fun family day!
pools.transit: Travel to High Park Station. Board the 30 Lambton and travel to Prince Edward. Walk south on Prince Edward, then east on Government Rd. to Marquis Ave. Walk south to number 37.

pools.description: Lawrence Heights Community Centre is the heart of the City and the Community, located directly across from the Lawrence West Subway Station. A wide range of programs are offered for all ages -- from newborns up to and including our very own feisty older adults. Lawrence Heights CC is a fun place to play, meet and share our great community resources!!!
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence West Station. Board the 109B Ranee and travel to Replin. Walk south to 5 Replin Road.

pools.description: A 5-hectare park near Danforth and Coxwell Avenues that features a dog off-leash area, an outdoor pool, a wading pool and a children's playground. During the winter there is also an artificial ice rink in operation.Monarch Park outdoor swimming pool and Atificial Ice Rink is located inside Monarch Park. The swimming pool area features a 25m pool with diving area, 2 storey waterslide, raised seating area, and a separate wading pool area. Monarch Park Pool also offers a variety of swimming lessons for all ages, including leadership classes and parent and tot classes.
pools.transit: Travel to Greenwood Station. Walk east on Danforth and then south on Gillard to 115 Felstead Ave.

pools.description: Large multi-purpose facility featuring year round programming for all ages and abilities. Programs include art, skating, fitness and general interest classes, as well as drop-in times for older adults, preschoolers and youth. Recreational swim and skate times offered. Direct Access to Toronto Public Library - McGregor Branch.
pools.transit: Travel to Eglinton Station. Board the 54A Lawrence East and travel to the farside of Canlish. Arrive at 2231 Lawrence Avenue East

pools.description: This 4.7 hectare park on Lawrence Avenue East east of Morningside Rd. featuresd a lighted ball diamond, 5 lighted tennis courts, a splash pad and a children's playground. Connected to the park is Heron Park Community Recreation Centre.
pools.transit: Travel to Kennedy Station. Board the 86A Scarborough and travel to Lawrence. On the eastbound side of Lawrence, board the 54E Lawrence East and travel to the farside of Manse Road. Walk south to 292 Manse Road.

pools.description: Recently reopened, the centre offers youth program space on the main floor and new multi-purpose rooms added on the second floor. A wide variety of programs are offered for preschoolers, children, youth, adults, and older adults. This facility is a priority centre and programs are offered free of charge. Rooms are available for groups to permit.
pools.transit: Travel to Victoria Park Station. Board the 24 Victoria Park and travel to Edge Park.

pools.description: Northwood Community Centre is located in the Jane and Sheppard area and is a very popular site for meetings, banquets and recreation programs. The Northwood grounds back on to Northwood Park, providing a very picturesque setting.Program information: 416 395-6182Facility permits: 416 395-7876
pools.transit: Travel to Downsview Station. Board the 108 Downsview and travel to John Lindsay. Walk west on Clubhouse Court to number 15.

pools.description: Welcome to Ourland Outdoor Pool! This community pool is located one block east of Islington Ave., just south of Evans Avenue. We offer both swim lessons and leadership courses weekday mornings. Leisure swim, adult swim, and family swim are offered afternoons, evenings and weekends. Ourland Pool is also home to a very popular children and youth water polo team. Situated next to a park, basketball courts and playground area, the park and pool are the perfect place to spend an afternoon!
pools.transit: Travel to Islington Station. Board the 110A Islington South and travel to Judson. Walk east on Judson and north to 36 Ourland Ave.

pools.description: Mitchell Field is a multi use facility. It has an indoor arena and outdoor swimming pool. There is a full size gym with bleachers. A teaching kitchen and 3 multi purpose rooms round out the facilities.
pools.transit: Travel to North York Centre Station. Exit station, walk north on Yonge and then east on Church to number 89.

pools.description: Oakdale CC is a priority centre located close to the intersection of Jane Street and Grandravine Community Centre. Oakdale CC has a gym and meeting rooms, 2 staff offices, a kitchen, outdoor swimming poll, outdoor basketball pad and playground.
pools.transit: Travel to Downsview Station. Board the 108 Downsview and travel to Driftwood. Walk South West to 350 Grandravine Dr.

pools.description: North Toronto Memorial C.C. is a multi-use complex located on Eglinton Ave. between Yonge & Avenue Road. The centre has indoor and outdoor pools, a fitness centre, weight room, gymnasium, multi-purpose rooms, meeting space, a large lobby and a beautiful program area for older adults. NTMCC offers a wide variety of programming for all ages. Our active Advisory Council contributes to the facility with donations of new equipment and staff support. Eglinton Park, located to the north, is a large multi-use park which is home to community operated soccer and baseball organizations as well as the North Toronto Memorial Arena.
pools.transit: Travel to Eglinton Station. Board 32 Eglinton West and travel to Lascelles. Arrive at 200 Eglinton Ave West.

pools.description: A large multi-use facility located in the Peanut area on Don Mills road west just north of Sheppard Ave. Programs are offered for preschoolers, children, youth, adults and older adults. Rooms are also available to permit for individuals or groups.
pools.transit: Travel to Don Mills Station. Board the 25 Don Mills and travel to Deerford. Walk north to 2975 Don Mills Rd.

pools.description: Mary McCormick has a fully stocked fitness facility with cardio, free weights, and nautilis equipment. A 25yd warm water pool with viewing gallery, large gymnasium, fitness, dance and yoga studios. Two large preschool rooms, youth and older adult lounges.
pools.transit: Travel to St. Patrick station. Board the 505 Dundas and travel to Sheridan. Walk southto 66 Sheridan Ave.

pools.description: North Toronto Memorial C.C. is a multi-use complex located on Eglinton Ave. between Yonge & Avenue Road. The centre has indoor and outdoor pools, a fitness centre, weight room, gymnasium, multi-purpose rooms, meeting space, a large lobby and a beautiful program area for older adults. NTMCC offers a wide variety of programming for all ages. Our active Advisory Council contributes to the facility with donations of new equipment and staff support. Eglinton Park, located to the north, is a large multi-use park which is home to community operated soccer and baseball organizations as well as the North Toronto Memorial Arena.
pools.transit: Travel to Eglinton Station. Board 32 Eglinton West and travel to Lascelles. Arrive at 200 Eglinton Ave West.

pools.description: Memorial Pool and Health Club is a newer facility, located in a quiet residential neighbourhood, just off Montgomery Road. A wide variety of aquatic programming is offered weekdays, weeknights and weekends. This includes a vast learn to swim program, popular Aquafit classes, an extensive leadership program, and leisure and lane swimming opportunities for persons of all ages and abilities. We strive to meet the needs of the entire community and make every visit enjoyable for the whole family. Memorial Health Club is City of Toronto Type B location which offers a variety of services to assist in personal Health and Wellness. Our co-ed Health Club is equipped with a variety of cardio and strength equipment. We offer a wide range of aerobic classes for those who enjoy a group setting led by a qualified fitness instructor.
pools.transit: travel to Royal York Station. Walk north on Royal York Rd and then west on Wilgar Rd. Walk north west to 44 Montgomery Road.

pools.description: This Recreation Centre has a gym and a few community rooms for programing. With access to the TDSB pool. Primary clients are school aged children 5 to 14 years
pools.transit: Travel to Queen Station. On the eastbound side of Queen board the 501 Queen and travel to Connaught. Walk east to woodfield and then north to number 56.

pools.description: Parkdale Community Centre is fully accessible shared use facility. It is located one block north of Queen St. west on Lansdowne Avenue in historical Parkdale. It features a 25m pool, a separate wading pool, two gymnasiums which can accommodate a variety of activities, and a community room and limited access to a full function kitchen. Permits are also available for your next family get together, i.e., birthday parties, baby showers, community meetings, special events. Please contact the facility for more program & access information.
pools.transit: Travel to St. Andrew's Station. On westbound side of Queen board the 501 Queen and travel to Lansdowne. Walk north to 75 Lansdowne Ave.

pools.description: Regent Park Aquatic Centre (RPAC) is the newest development in the Toronto/East York District. This stand alone aquatic facility is located in the heart of Regent Park and features a Lap Pool, Leisure Pool, Warm Water Pool, Tarzan Rope, Diving Board and Water Slide. Our universal changerooms allow for full accessibility for all patrons. Our programs accommodate participants from preschoolers to older adults. This centre is easily accessible by transit, bike, and foot.
pools.transit: Travel on 505 Dundas streetcar to DUNDAS ST E at SUMACH stop; or travel on 65 Parliament bus to PARLIAMENT at DUNDAS stop, walk east to 640 Dundas St.

pools.description: Please contact the Community Centre for more information
pools.transit: Travel to Dundas Station. On westbound side of Dundas at Victoria, board the 505 Dundas and travel to Bathurst. Walk south to 707 Dundas St W

pools.description: Matty Eckler is a facility that provides programs at quality level training at cost effective prices available to all. It is a friendly and community oriented Community Recreation Centre located south-east corner of Pape Ave. and Gerrard St.
pools.transit: Travel to College Station. On the eastbound side of Carlton board the 506 Carlton and travel to Pape. Walk east to 953 Gerrard St. E

pools.description: Mowat pool is Located in Sir Oliver Mowat Cl. It is a standard 25 metre tank pool offering swimming lessons and leisure swim.
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence East Station. Board the 54A Lawrence East and travel to Centennial. Walk east to 5400 Lawrence Ave E.

pools.description: A Community School located south of Bloor Street, 1 block east of Islington Avenue, on Norseman Avenue. We are a Community School, that also has a pool on site. We offer a wide range of programs from sports, dance, and music, to fitness and preschool. Programs are available from preschool to older adults. The 25 meter Norseman Community Pool offers both recreational and learn-to-swim programs to all ages and abilities. Norseman Pool is also known for it's daytime aqua fitness classes focusing on the older adult population. Norseman is also home to the Norseman Masters Aquatic Club as well as offering a popular recreational swim team program (Splash) to children in the community.
pools.transit: Travel to Islington Station. Board the 110A Islington South and travel to Norseman. Walk east to 105 Norseman St

pools.description: The Swansea Community Recreation Centre and Pool has been servicing the Swansea community, in Bloor West Village for over 25 years. We cater from the new born to the older adult. Programs offered include aquafit, swim lessons, leisure and lane swimming,
pools.transit: travel to Runnymede Station. Walk south on Runnymede then west on Morningside Ave to Lavinia. Walk west to 15 Waller Ave.

pools.description: The Elms Pool & C.S. is located east of Islington Ave., North of the 401. Nestled between a Public and Catholic school in a lovely residential area, The Elms caters to a wide variety of cultural, socio-economic and religious groups. The Pool and Community School offers a wide variety of programs for all ages including fitness, splash, child/youth/adult swimming lessons, sports, art, summer camps, special events etc...
pools.transit: Travel to Royal York Station. Board the 73C Royal York and travel to the farside of Golfdown. Walk west to 45 Golfdown Drive.

pools.description: Vaughan Road Academy pool is a TDSB pool located at Vaughan Rd and Oakwood Ave. It is an instructional pool - offering instructional swim lessons for all ages.
pools.transit: Travel to St. Clair West Station. Board the 90A Vaughan and travel to Winona Farside. Walk to 529 Vaughan Road.

pools.description: St Lawrence Community Centre is located in the historic St Lawrence Neighbourhood of downtown Toronto. The community centre shares it's space with Market Lane Public School and the St Lawrence Community Day Care. It offer a full range of programming for families, children, adults and older adults.Please note: Drop-in Lane Swim for 6:30 to 8:30 am requires a pass which should be purchased from the office in advance. The office is not open at 6:30 am and swimmers will be unable to pay in cash.
pools.transit: Travel to King Station. On the eastbound side of King,  board the 504 King and travel to Sherbourne. Walk south on Sherbourne to The Esplanade and then east to 230 The Esplanade.

pools.description: West Hill pool is located in West Hill Cl. It is a tank pool offering swimming lessons and leisure swim.
pools.transit: Travel to Kennedy Station. Board the 116 Morningside and travel to 345. Walk north to 350 Morningside Ave.

pools.description: Laurier pool is located in Sir Wilfred Laurier Collegiate Institute. It is a standard tank pool offering swimming lessons and leisure swims.
pools.transit: Travel to Kennedy Station. Board the 116 Morningside and travel to Livingston. Walk east to 145 Guildwood Pky.

pools.description: Wallace Emerson has a fully stocked fitness facility with cardio, free weights, and nautilis equipment. A 25 metre warm water pool with large window for viewing, large gymnasium, fitness, dance and yoga studios. One large preschool room, youth and Older Adults lounge.Read about Wallace Emerson Bike Park
pools.transit: Travel to Dufferin Station. Board the 29 Dufferin and travel to Dupont. Walk north to 1260 Dufferin St.

pools.description: Weston Cl Pool is a 25 yard, 6 lane pool. We run a variety of aquatic programs evenings and weekends including swim lessons for all ages and leisure swims.
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence West Station. Board the 58B Malton and travel to Pine. Walk north to 100 Pine Street.

pools.description: Pine Point Outdoor Pool features a large deck area with a beach entry and water spray features, ideal for young children. An in-water bench with therapeutic jets is a great area to sit and relax! Our schedule features swimming lessons for all ages, youth lifeguard club, leadership programs and water polo. Recreational swims are offered afternoons and evenings.
pools.transit: Travel to Islington Station. Board the 37A Islington and travel to Allenby. Walk east on Allenby and then south to 15 Grierson Road

pools.description: Wexford pool is located in Wexford Collegiate Institute. It is a standard 25 metre tank pool offering lessons and leisure swims.
pools.transit: Travel to Eglinton Station. Board the 54 Lawrence East and travel to Pharmacy. Walk north to 1176 Pharmacy Ave.

pools.description: Roding Community Centre is located in the Keele and Wilson area. The centre is on the north side of Roding Park and is home to many community groups and a very popular aftershool program.

Welcome to Park Lawn Outdoor Pool! This community pool is host to a broad spectrum of aquatic programs including swim lessons for all ages and swimming abilities, family, leisure and length swim. In addition, Park Lawn offers a fun opportunity for children and youth to further develop their swimming skills as part of a recreational swim team. Situated adjacent to tennis courts and a play structure, Park Lawn Pool and Park is a great place to spend a summer day!
pools.transit: Travel to Old Mill Station. Board the 66A Prince Edward and travel to the farside of Park Lawn. Walk north to 340 Park Lawn Road.

pools.description: Richmond Gardens Pool is located within Silver Creek Park. Featuring newly renovated large changerooms, and a family changeroom with an accessible shower area. Stairs with a railing make entering and exiting the pool easy for all ages. Our schedule features swimming lessons for all ages. Recreational swims are offered afternoons and evenings.
pools.transit: Travel to Eglinton West Station. Board the 32B Eglinton West and travel to Wincott. Walk north on Wincott and the east to 44 Strathdee Drive.

pools.description: Pleasantview Community Centre is a multi-purpose facility in the Victoria Park and Finch area.  This facility offers programs for preschoolers, children, youth, adults and older adults. Rooms are available for groups to permit.
pools.transit: Travel to Finch Station. Board the 39E Finch East and travel to Cherokee. Walk south on Cherokee, then west on Faye Dr. And then south on Lucifer Dr to Van Horne Ave. Walk to number 545.

pools.description: Smithfield Outdoor Pool is located in Smithfield Park, near a popular skateboard area. Part of the extended hours program, Smithfield is open until 11:45pm on designated hot nights. Swimming lessons are offered in the mornings. Our recreational swim schedule features adult lane swim.
pools.transit: Travel to Kipling Station. Board the 191 Highway 27 Rocket and travel to Silverstone Walk east on Silverstone and then south to 173 Mount Olive Drive.

pools.description: A 15.3 hectare park along the Black Creek ravine between Jane St and Scarlett Rd north of St Clair Ave West. This park features trails along the Black Creek, three ball diamonds (one with lights), a splash pad and a children's playground. At the east end of the park is the Smythe Park Outdoor Pool. Smythe Park Outdoor Pool is located in the heart of Smythe Park, nearest intersection is Jane Street and St Clair Avenue West. This facility includes a baby/tot pool and there is a Splash Pad located at the nearby park. Our recreational swims include daily afternoon and evening Leisure Swims and evening Lane Swims. Swimming lessons are not offered.

Welcome to Rotary Outdoor Pool! This fully accessible, newly renovated community pool is located in a picturesque park steps from the waterfront. We offer a very large and popular learn to swim program, catering to all ages and abilities, weekday mornings. Afternoon, evening and weekend aquatic programming includes adult aquafit, leisure, family and lane swimming opportunities. In addition, Rotary Pool offers a fun opportunity for children and youth to further develop their swimming skills with both a recreational swim and waterpolo team. Situated next to tennis courts and a playground area, the park and pool are the perfect place to spend a summer day!
pools.transit: Travel to Osgoode Station. On the westbound side of Queen, board the 501 Queen and travel to 10th. Walk west to 11th St. and south to number 25.

pools.description: Welcome to Sunnyside/Gus Ryder Outdoor Pool - enjoy a wonderful day along Toronto's vibrant lakeshore; located at the foot of Lakeshore Blvd. & Parkside Drive. You can access Sunnyside by car (metered parking after 4pm and on weekends), walking and bicycle paths located directly north and south of the pool while enjoying morning swimming lessons for all ages followed by public and adult width swims every day.
pools.transit: Take the 501 Queen St streetcar to The Queensway and Parkside drive. Head south to the Lakeshore pedestrian/bike path. Walk west to Sunnyside/Gus Ryder Pool. This route takes 5 minutes to walk, and is only 390 meters

pools.description: This 18-hectare park near Danforth and Broadveiw Avenues is popular for winter toboganning and views of downtown Toronto skyline. Riverdale Park East features two ball diamonds, three multi-purpose sports fields, a running track, seven tennis courts, an artifical outdoor ice rink and ball hockey pad, a picnic area and a children's playground. The ice rink features a hockey pad which is also a please pad. There are change rooms for changing into skates. There is a nice playground to the east of the rink. A naturalized area at the north end of the park has many recreational trails idea for walking. Located at the north entrance to the park on Broadview Ave is the Riverdale Park East Outdoor Pool.
pools.transit: Take the Broadview streetcar two stops past the Danforth and walk down the stairs to the rink.

pools.description: Welcome to West Deane Outdoor Pool! We offer swim lessons, for all ages and abilities, weekday mornings. Leisure swim, adult swim, and family swim are offered afternoons, evenings and weekends. Situated next to a newly renovated play structure, in the middle of very spacious West Deane Park, this community pool is a hidden gem!
pools.transit: Travel to Royal York Station. Board the 48 Rathburn and travel to Cottrelle. Walk north on Cottrelle going north west on Archerhill. Follow Archerhill North west and then go east at Sedgebrook Drive. Arrive at 19 Sedgebrook Dr.

pools.description: Westmount Outdoor Pool is a hidden gem, located within Westmount Park. Next to tennis courts and a playground area, this quiet park and pool are the perfect area for a fun family day!
pools.transit: Travel to Runnymede Station. Board the 79 Scarlett Road and travel to the farside of La Rose. Walk west on La Rose and then North west to 22 Arcade Drive.

pools.description: Westgrove Outdoor Pool is located at the north end of Westgrove Park, adjacent to tennis courts. We offer swim lessons for all ages, as well as adult lane swim and family swim, for children and adults to come together.
pools.transit: Travel to Kipling Station. Board the 46 Martin Grove and travel to Westway. Walk west to 15 Redgrave Drive.

pools.description: Welcome to Wedgewood pool! This Outdoor Pool is located in a quiet residential neighbourhood, in a park setting. We offer a very popular learn to swim and leadership program, catering to all ages and abilities, weekday mornings. Afternoon, evening and weekend aquatic programming include leisure, family and length swimming opportunities. Wedgewood Pool is also home to a very popular children's recreational swim team - Splash. We strive to meet the needs of the community and make every visit enjoyable for the whole family.
pools.transit: Travel to Islington Station. Board the 50 Burnhamthorpe and travel to the farside of Martin Grove. Walk south on Martin Grove then west to 17 Swan Avenue.

pools.pool: West Mall Outdoor Pool - Outdoor Pool
pools.description: Welcome to West Mall Outdoor Pool! This fully accessible community pool offers a broad spectrum of aquatic programs including swim lessons for all ages and abilities, an adapted and integrated aquatic program, a children's recreational swim team, and both leisure and lane swimming. Situated next to a ball hockey arena, tennis courts and playground, the pool and park are the perfect place to spend a summer afternoon!
pools.transit: Travel to Islington Station. Board the 50 Burnhamthorpe and travel to West Mall. Walk south to 370 The West Mall

pools.description: This popular tank pool hosts both structured aquatic lessons as well as recreational swim times.
pools.transit: Travel to Scarborough Centre Station. Board the 130 Middlefield and travel to Invergordon. On the northbound side of McCowan, board the 129 Mccowan North and travel to Sandhurst N Walk west to 1550 Sandhurst Circle.

pools.description: Alderwood Pool is a part of the Alderwood Centre, located in the Horner/Brown's Line area. Our centre features amenities such as Alderwood Pool, the Toronto Public Library - Alderwood Branch and Sir Adam Beck Public School. Alderwood is pleased to offer a broad spectrum of innovative aquatic and fitness programs for persons of all ages and abilities. This includes a large learn-to-swim program, extensive and varied aquafit program, and leisure/lane swimming. Please come visit and experience the best Alderwood has to offer!
pools.transit: Travel to Islington Station. Board the 110A Islington South and travel to the Farside of Horner. Walk west to Orianna Drive and then north to number 2.

pools.description: Bendale pool is located in Bendale BTI. It is a 25 metre tank pool offering lessons and leisure swims.
pools.transit: Travel to Kennedy Station. Board the 57 Midland and travel to Treewood.Walk north to 1555 Midland Ave.

pools.description: A 7.4 hecatre park on the east bank of the Humber River at Lawrence Ave and Weston Rd. This park features two ball diamonds including one with lights, a lighted artificial turf sports field, four lighted tennis courts, a skateboard area, a basketball court, a splash pad and a children's playground. Also locate near the park entrance is the Weston Lions Park Outdoor Pool and Weston Arena.Welcome to Weston Lions Outdoor Pool - We offer the perfect outing for all families with 2 pools that can satisfy all water needs. We offer leadership training and junior lifeguard club on weekday mornings followed by afternoon and evening public swimmin
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence West Station. Board the 58B Malton and travel to Little. Arrive at 2125 Lawrence Avenue.

pools.description: Agincourt CRC & Leisure Pool is one of only two leisure pools in the Scarborough District providing lessons, recreation swims and birthday parties for all ages. We are home to Agincourt Lions Club, Agincourt Lawnbowling Club, Scarborough Horseshoe Club and Agincourt Tennis Club. Our programmes accomodate participants from Preschoolers to the Older Adult. Two indoor rinks provide ice for hockey and leisure skates. The centre also offers a Snoezelen Room. Please contact the centre for details.
pools.transit: Travel to Kennedy Station. Board the 57 Midland and travel to the farside of Rural. Walk east on Rural to 31 Glen Watford Drive.

pools.description: Annette Community Recreation Centre is a recently renovated urban community centre serving the "Junction" and surrounding community. Facilities include a swimming pool, weight room, dance studio and several multipurpose rooms and gymnasium. The pool and facilities are fully accessible with separate special needs washroom/changing facility, pool lift and facility elevator. Programing takes place 7 days a week and facility rental inquires for private functions are welcome.
pools.transit: From Jane station take the 26 Dupont bus and From Runnymend Station take the 71 Runnymede North bus.

pools.description: Attached to on of the Toronto District School Board schools (Brown Public School), Brown Community Centre offers programs and activities for resident of all ages. Recreation staff are available in the office who can provide program registration and information about events in the faciltiy, satellite locations and the community.
pools.intersection: Avenue Rd. & St. Clair Ave. W
pools.transit: Travel to St. Clair Station. Board the 512 St Clair and travel to Avenue Road. Walk south to 454 Avenue Road.

pools.description: Beaches Recreation Centre is the centre of the Beaches community. Preschool and school-aged programs as well as fitness for adults are the mainstays of the program schedule.
pools.transit: Travel to Main Street Station. Board the 64 Main and travel to the farside of Williamson. Walk west to 6 Williamson Rd

pools.description: Boylen Pool is a 25 yard, 5 lane pool. We run a variety of aquatic programs evenings and weekends including swim lessons for all ages, aquafit, leisure swims and leadership courses.
pools.transit: Travel to Lawrence West Station. Board the 58A Malton and travel to Culford. Walk north on Culford and then west on Falstaff Ave to 155 Falstaff.

pools.description: Antibes Community Centre is a fully accessible Community Centre in the Bathurst St. & Finch Ave. W. area, which offers a variety of recreational programs for all ages. Antibes also serves as a host for many local community groups who use the facility to run their individual programs and events. Come visit Antibes Community Centre, your home away from home!
pools.transit: Travel to Wilson Station. Board the 160 Bathurst North and travel to Drewry . Antibes Dr. is on the west side of the street. Take the right and walk to 140 Antibes dr

pools.description: Cedarbrae pool is located in Cedarbrae Collegiate Institute. It is a 25 yard tank pool offering swimming lessons and leisure swims.
pools.transit: Travel to Kennedy Station. Board the 116 Morningside and travel to Markham Road. On the northbound side of Markham Rd, board the 102A Markham Road and travel to the farside Greencrest. Walk north to 550 Markham Rd.

pools.description: The Birchmount Community Centre is a multi-purpose facility with programs & services offered through the Birchmount Bluffs Neighbourhood Centre.Birchmount Leisure Pool is one of two leisure pools in the Scarborough District providing swim lessons, Lane, Leisure and Family swims and birthday parties for all ages. Our features include a sauna, warm conversation pool with jets, a large waterslide, children's shallow area with a children's slide and a spraying elephant. Our programs accommodate participants from Preschoolers to Older Adult.
pools.transit: Travel to Warden Station. Board the 69B Warden South and travel to Danforth Avenue, Walk south to 93 Birchmount Road.

pools.description: Nestled in Trinity Bellwoods Park, located West of Bathurst St., just North of Queen St., Trinity CRC offers a variety of programs for all ages. The open concept building lends itself to an array of community events taking place all year long. Pre-school, school age, youth and adult programs offered seasonally both within the centre and in Trinity Bellwoods Park. Come join us!
pools.intersection: N of Queen & W of Bathurst
pools.transit:
Travel to Osgoode Station. On the westbound side of Queen, board the 501 Queen and travel to Strachan.
Walk north west through the Trinity Bellwoods Park to 155 Crawford St.

pools.description: Centennial Recreation Centre West is located one block west of Keele St. on Eglinton Ave. West. It is a shared use facility with the TDSB and is attached to York Memorial C. I. Programming is offered mainly in the evenings and on Saturdays throughout the Fall, Winter and Spring. Summer programming includes camps and instructional swimming. The pool (25 yd 6 lanes) offers a broad spectrum of aquatic programs evenings and weekends, including lessons for all ages, aquafit, leisure swims and leadership courses. Please contact (416) 394-2475 for General & Sports Programs and Camps, (416) 394-2476 for Aquatic Programs.
pools.transit: Travel to Eglinton West Station. Board the 32D Eglinton West and travel to Bicknell. Arrive at 2694 Eglinton Ave West.

pools.description: D.A. Morrison pool is a shared use facility. It features a 25 metre pool, 13 feet at the deepest point, with a large shallow end. This pool offers swimming lessons for all ages and recreational swimming. Please contact the facility for details.
pools.transit: Travel to Main Street Station. Board the 62 Mortimer and travel to Gledhill. Walk north to 271 Gledhill Ave

pools.description: Dennis R Timbrell is located in the Flemingdon Park Area, near the Ontario Science Centre. It is the hub of a high-density, multi-cultural community. A branch public library and licensed day care centre are part of the complex. Programs are provided for all ages from preschool to older adult from early morning lane swim to late night sport programs.
pools.transit: Travel to Broadview Station. Board the 100 Flemingdon Park and travel to St Dennis. Walk North to 29 St. Dennis Dr.

pools.description: Earl Beatty offers a wide variety of recreational programs for all ages including: swimming lessons, December, March, and summer day camp, creative arts, ballet, jazz, gymnastics beginner recreational and advanced, caregiver & tot playtime, kindergym, women's sports club, karate beginner intermediate and advanced, soccer houseleague, touch football, t-ball, and ESSO NHL Street Buds, ball hockey. Fitness activities yoga, pilates, and Tai Chi. Youth leadership training in babysitting.
pools.transit: Travel to Coxwell Station. Exit station and walk north on Coxwell and then east on Glebeholme Blvd to number 455.

pools.description: Offers a wide variety of programming including an adult fitness club, swimming and skating lessons, leisure swimming and skating, fitness classes, yoga, tai chi, Pilates, Latin dance, watercolour painting, art studio for children, youth club for teens and summer sports camps. Outdoor activities include sports pad, tennis courts, softball diamond, playground and skate park.
pools.transit: Travel to Leslie Station. Board the 51 Leslie and travel to Dexter. Arrive at 6000 Leslie Street.

pools.description: Douglas Snow Aquatic Centre is located north of Sheppard Ave on the west side of Yonge St at the North York Civic Centre subway stop. The centre boasts a 50 metre pool which offers recreational swim programs for all ages including lap swimming, leisure swim and therapy times in the whirlpool. Douglas Snow Aquatic Centre offers a wide range of instructional programming from guardian (parent and tot) to senior learn to swim programs. It has a great aquafit program which runs 5 days a week.
pools.transit: Travel to North York Centre Station. Exit station and walk west for 1/2 a block. Behind North York City Hall.

pools.description: Small facility located in Frankland School, use of pool, two rooms,and gym to run programs during day and afterschool.
pools.transit: Travel to Chester Station. Exit station ans walk south to Danforth Ave, east to Logan and south to 816 Logan Ave.

pools.description: Fairmount is a shared use facility that offers programs in 2 large community spaces. School age art and dance programs and adult fitness are the main programs.
pools.transit:
Travel to Coxwell Station. Board the 22 Coxwell and travel to Fairford.
Walk east to 1757 Gerrard Street East.

pools.description: Gordon A. Brown pool is a shared use facility. It features a 25yd pool with a large shallow end. It is approximately 3 metres deep in the deep end. This pool offers recreational swimming and swimming lessons for all ages. Please contact the facility for details.
pools.transit: Travel to Victoria Park Station. Board the 24 Victoria Park and travel to St Clair. On the westbound of St Clair at Victoria Park board the 70 O Connor and travel to Selwyn. Arrive at 2800 St. Clair Ave E.

pools.description: Emery Pool is a 25 yard, 5 lane pool. We run a variety of aquatic programs evenings and weekends including swim lessons for all ages, Aquafit, leisure swims and leadership courses.
pools.transit: Travel to Wilson Station. Board the 165 Weston Road North and travel to Garyray. Arrive at 3995 Weston Rd.

pools.description: Harrison Pool is located Queen and Mccaul St. The pool is 20 yards. The building is also open for shower use.
pools.transit: Travel to Osgoode Station. Exit the station and walk west to McCaul St. Walk north to Stephanie and then west to number 15

pools.description: East York Community Centre offers the full spectrum of programs for perschool to older adult, we have it all. We are the only type B Health Club in the Toronto & East York District, we are among the leaders in the number of swim lessons, fitness classes and permits that we offer. Come on over and check us out!!!
pools.transit: Travel to Pape Station. Board the 25 Don Mills and travel to the farside of Torrens. Arrive at 1081 1/2 Pape Ave.

pools.description: Attached to one of the Toronto District School Board schools (Hillcrest Public School), Hillcrest Community Centre offers programs and activities for resident of all ages. Recreation staff are available in the office who can provide program registration and information about events in the faciltiy, satellite locations and the community.
pools.transit: Travel to Dupont Station. Board the 127 Davenport and travel to Bathurst.  Walk north to 1339 Bathurst St.

pools.pool: Gus Ryder Pool And Health Club
pools.description: Gus Ryder is a City of Toronto Type B Club which offers 24 diverse fitness classes per week and a variety of cardio equipment for individual use. Our weight room offers a multiple range of free weights and an assortment of multi-purpose strength machines. Body bars and stability balls are available for individual and class use. Our pool is a warm 25 yard pool with chair lift and stairs. We offer swimming lessons, Aquafit and arthritis Aquafit classes, public swims, family swims, and lane swims.
pools.transit: Travel to Kipling Station. Board the 44 Kipling South and travel to Birmingham. Walk west to 1 Faustina Drive

pools.description: Scarborough Centennial Recreation Centre is a multi-purpose Recreation facility which features a Pool, Hockey & Figure Skating Rinks, Dedicated Pre-school room, Weight Room and an Auditorium. The Centre also has Outdoor facilities which include Beach Volleyball, Basketball and Tennis Courts. The Centre is home to the Scarboro Figure Skating Club, Scarborough Springboard Diving Club, Scarborough Underwater Club and The Centennial Tennis Club. There are a variety of programs and activities for all ages, Pre-schoolers to Older adults.
This popular tank pool hosts both structured aquatic lessons as well as recreational swim times.
pools.transit: Travel to Finch Station. Board the 39E Finch East and travel to Warden On the northbound side of Warden, board the 68 Warden and travel to Bridletown N. Walk east to 2501 Bridletown Circle.

pools.description: A large facility located in the Logan St. Queen St. area. Jimmie Simpson Community Centre is known as a priority centre hub for recreational programming with a variety of opportunities for everyone from pre-school to older adults. It offers a wide-range of activities including fitness, youth, sports, after-school and pre-school programs. Jimmie Simpson Artificial Ice rink is located inside Jimmie Simpson park. The ice rink features at hockey pad which is also a please pad. There change rooms for changing into skates. There tennis courts and a soccer field in the park.
pools.transit: Travel to Queen Station. Board the 501 Queen and travel to Empire. Walk east to number 870

pools.description: John Innes Community Centre is located in the Moss Park Neighbourhood of downtown Toronto. It offers a wide variety of programs for all ages
pools.transit: Travel to Queen Station. Board the 501 Queen and travel to Sherbourne. Walk north to 150 Sherbourne St.

pools.description: A small, community-oriented facility located on the north campus of Humber College (Hwy 27 and Finch area). Humber Community Pool is known as a friendly place to swim and socialize and is popular with the families and older adults in the community. In addition to a multitude of daily recreational swims, Humber Pool offers swimming lessons 7 days a week and extensive leadership programming.
pools.transit: Travel to Kipling Station. Board the 191 Highway 27 Rocket and travel to the farside of Hwy 27. Walk west to 205 Humber College Blvd.

pools.description: This 3 level facility houses a 25 metre pool, 2 multi purpose areas, a kitchen, and a small weight room.. We have lockers, showers and changerooms on the third floor. We offer a wide range of programming for all ages.
pools.transit: Travel to Main Street Station. Exit the station and walk south to 245 Main Street.

pools.description: Pearson pool is unique in its design as it has the availablitlity of a one meter diving platforms and boards. This facility is also used for structured insturctional lessons, recreational swim times and pool permits.
pools.transit: Travel to Scarborough Centre Station. Board the 131E Nugget and travel to Tapscott. Walk northwest to 150 Tapscott R.

pools.description: Leaside Memorial Pool is located in the neighborhood of Leaside. Leaside has a wheel chair accessible lift and elevator to the pool area and a multi-access change room. Leaside offers instructional swim lessons for all ages as well as recreation swim times.*Note: Leaside Memorial Gardens Arena is currently working on the construction of a second arena to the complex. As such, construction has begun and will ongoing for the immediate future. The Leaside Memorial Gardens Pool entrance will now be accessible only through the original Leaside Memorial Gardens Arena entrance. Cars will not be able to access the drop off area and pool users must walk through the arena to enter the pool. Parking has also been significantly reduced.
pools.transit: Travel to Eglinton Station. Board the 56 Leaside and travel to Millwood Rd. Walk South West on Southvale Dr to 1073 Millwood Rd.

pools.description: Joseph J. Piccininni is one of the largest facilities in Toronto. We offer a variety of programs for everyone from preschoolers to older adults, all of which are located in accessible areas. The pool offers programs including swimming lessons, lane swim, aqua fitness, leisure swim, leadership courses, fitness, sports, female only swims and much more Our B facility Health Club has all new cardio, muscular strength and free weight equipment and knowledgeable staff to assist and guide you. Fitness classes and swimming included with all membership options.
pools.transit: Travel to St Clair West Station. Board the 512 St Clair and travel to Lansdowne. Walk west to 1369 St Clair Ave W.
